articles.title: Donald Trump Appoints Andrew Ferguson as New FTC Chair

articles.title: Making a $1B investment in the US? Trump pledges expedited permits - but there are hurdles
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President-elect Donald Trump is promising expedited federal permits for energy projects and other construction worth more than $1 billion.
